typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserName as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		EmployeeId as string,
		IsExecEmp as string,
		EmailId as string,
		TelNumber as string,
		HomePhNumber as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		PostalAddress as string,
		TerminationDate as date,
		IsActive as string,
		EmployeeType as string,
		CostCenter as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		DivName as string,
		SectName as string,
		PostionName as string,
		EESubArea as string,
		EESubGrpName as string,
		BranchName as string,
		UnitName as string,
		WPFullName as string,
		WPEmail as string,
		WrkLocDesc as string,
		MgrDispName as string,
		MgrEmailId as string,
		SupDispName as string,
		SupEmailId as string,
		EEGroupDesc as string,
		BU as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(UserName!=' ')) ~> DeleteRows
DeleteRows sink(input(
		UserName as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		EmployeeId as string,
		IsExecEmp as string,
		EmailId as string,
		TelNumber as string,
		HomePhNumber as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		PostalAddress as string,
		TerminationDate as date,
		IsActive as string,
		EmployeeType as string,
		CostCenter as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		DivName as string,
		SectName as string,
		PostionName as string,
		EESubArea as string,
		EESubGrpName as string,
		BranchName as string,
		UnitName as string,
		WPFullName as string,
		WPEmail as string,
		WrkLocDesc as string,
		MgrDispName as string,
		MgrEmailId as string,
		SupDispName as string,
		SupEmailId as string,
		EEGroupDesc as string,
		BU as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserName'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UserName,
		DisplayName,
		EmployeeId,
		IsExecEmp,
		EmailId,
		TelNumber,
		HomePhNumber,
		PostalCode,
		PostalAddress,
		TerminationDate,
		IsActive,
		EmployeeType,
		CostCenter,
		CompanyName,
		DeptName,
		DivName,
		SectName,
		PostionName,
		EESubArea,
		EESubGrpName,
		BranchName,
		UnitName,
		WPFullName,
		WPEmail,
		WrkLocDesc,
		MgrDispName,
		MgrEmailId,
		SupDispName,
		SupEmailId,
		EEGroupDesc,
		BU
	),
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
